front.title: Updates for the Back-to-Back Frame Benchmark in RFC 2544
front.abstract: Fundamental benchmarking methodologies for network interconnect devices of interest to the IETF are defined in RFC 2544. This memo updates the procedures of the test to measure the Back-to-Back Frames benchmark of RFC 2544, based on further experience. This memo updates Section 26.4 of RFC 2544.
